titles.title: To establish a special registration under the Controlled Substances Act for schedule I eligible investigational drugs under the Federal Right to Try law.
To establish a special registration under the Controlled Substances Act for schedule I eligible investigational drugs under the Federal Right to Try law.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
